meta_description: "Upgrade your bathroom with this 60in. vanity set featuring a 0.75in. thick vanity top, 2 basins, and 4 doors. Made of solid wood, it includes soft close hinges and slides. No electrical outlet. From the Beckett collection, made in Vietnam. 2 year warranty."
meta_title: "Beckett 60" Double Basin Vanity Set: Freestanding Wood Cabinet with Cultured Marble Top"
details:
Fantastic value and classic design. The elegant Beckett vanity has it all, with quality touches like brushed nickel accents, dove-tailed drawers, cultured marble counters and soft-close doors and drawers. Ample storage and a double-depth lower drawer give you plenty of room for those bathroom necessities. Do your bathroom right, with the beautiful Beckett vanity series.

Included Components:

  • Covered under Wyndham Collection's 2 year limited warranty
  • Wood vanity cabinet with 4 doors 3 and 2 shelves
  • Marble vanity top with 2 porcelain sinks and matching backsplash
  • Faucet is not included and must be purchased separately

Cabinet Features:

  • Constructed of environmentally friendly, high grade solid wood, plywood, and MDF, engineered to prevent warping and last a lifetime
  • Cabinet material undergoes a 12-stage wood preparation, sanding, painting, and finishing process
  • Highly water resistant low V.O.C sealed finish
  • Beautiful transitional styling that complements any bathroom
  • Practical floor standing design
  • Minimal assembly required
  • Deep dovetailed drawers
  • Fully extending undermount soft-close drawer slides
  • Concealed soft-close door hinges
  • Metal exterior hardware
  • Four functional doors
  • Three functional drawers
  • Plenty of easy-access storage and counter space

Vanity Top Features:

  • Includes cultured marble countertop with 3" backsplash
  • Porcelain undermount sinks included
  • Vanity top includes matching backsplash and sidesplash
  • Backsplash comes in two pieces that is cut from one single piece due to high probability of breakage
  • Countertop with rectangular sinks is drilled for single-hole faucet mounts
  • Faucets not included

Cabinet Specifications:

  • Cabinet Width: 59" (from left to right)
  • Cabinet Height: 34-1/4" (from top to bottom)
  • Cabinet Depth: 21-1/2" (from front to back)
  • Number of Doors: 4
  • Number of Drawers: 3
  • Number of Shelves: 2

Vanity Top Specifications:

  • Vanity Top Width: 60" (left edge to right edge)
  • Vanity Top Depth: 22" (front edge to back edge)
  • Backsplash Height: 3"
  • Number of Basins: 2
  • Sink Basin Measurements(Right): 17" L x 11-1/4" W x 6-1/2" H
  • Sink Basin Measurements(Left): 17" L x 11-1/4" W x 6-1/2" H
  • Number of Faucet Holes: 1
